Description: Papyrus; Demotic text recto and verso. Two columns of text on both sides. Recto text 1: 15 lines. Torn at both top and bottom and on the right. Left margin preserved. Recto text 2: 11 lines. Torn at both top and bottom and on the left. Right margin preserved. Verso text 1: Ends of 10 lines. Verso text 2: 11 lines. Torn at both top and bottom and on the left.
Curator's comments: Under study by S.M.T. (Steffie) van Gompel, Leiden University

Text 1 on the recto is a land lease. Text 2 is a list of matromonial goods/dowry. Text 1 on the verso is uncertain. Text 2 is possibly a land lease. The two texts on the recto are in different but very similar hands. They are quite distinct from the hands of the texts on the verso.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381060) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381060)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, fragile, loss Black ink (abraded, smudged) Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: kraft paper Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
